content: उपग्रहः {@--1@} Confinement, seizure. {@--2@} Defeat, frustration; <ls>Mu. 4. 2.</ls> {@--3@} A prisoner. {@--4@} Joining, addition. {@--5@} ({%a%}) Favour, encouragement, assistance, conciliation; सोपग्रहं <ls>K. 156.</ls> ({%b%}) Favourableness, kindness, complacence; सोपग्रह <ls>K. 264.</ls> {@--6@} Use. {@--7@} A kind of peace purchased by giving over every thing; cf <ls>H. 4. 121.</ls> {@--8@} The voice or pada of a verb. {@--9@} A pile or heap of kuśa grass. {@--10@} The presiding spirit or cause which directs a planet's motion. {@--11@} A minor planet (राहु, केतु &c.), a secondary heavenly body, such as a comet, meteor.
